name: Parasite Forest
description:
This game was created using Unreal Engine 5 as part of a 3 day game jam for University. 

The 3D models were created by Tom Lawrence

The Parasite's AI was created Luke Roberts

The Menu Button Sprite was created by Rafael Elloso

Everything else was created by me, environment & programming & sound design. 

Visual Assets taken from Itch & the Epic Marketplace
